articles.author: Robert Hart
articles.title: Chip Stock Rally Continues Wednesday After AI Boom Catapults Nvidia To World's Most Valuable Company - Forbes
articles.description: Nvidia shares continued to rally Wednesday after climbing 3.5% on Tuesday, sending the company’s capitalization to more than $3 trillion and overtaking tech juggernaut Microsoft as the world’s most valuable public company.
articles.content: Chip stocks jumped in out-of-hours trading on Wednesday as chipmaking giant Nvidia continued Tuesdays market rally that saw it dethrone Microsoft as the worlds most valuable public company and boost … [+4464 chars]
